text: 19.2 Lo 32.43, 2 Kin 9.7, Lep 6.10, 15.3, 16.7, 18.20 Nɨgtep gɨl yɨbɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop bɨlok nɨŋɨd yul ñub agɨlak. Kanɨbtam binawl anɨb ak, God nop kelɨgɨl monmon gɨlɨg, God binɨb ne okok kɨlop paklɨlɨg gak agɨlak. Paklɨl, bɨ si dɨl, binɨb lum okok kɨlop kanɨb yomek abe gɨlak ak, nop nɨŋɨd pen yul awl yɨbɨl ñub agɨlak.
